name: Debate Time
description:
Have you ever wanted to role-play an unhinged conspiracy theorist and argue with randos on social media while sinking deeper and deeper into insanity? Me neither, but NOW WE CAN! 

Debate Time is a rogue-like procedurally generated card game in which you assume the role of a conspiracy theorist casually scrolling your social media timeline, looking for things to get mad at. Once you find a particularly enraging post it's D-D-DEBATE TIME. Play your hand of logical fallacies right and leave your opponents speechless. Rinse and repeat, just like you would in real life!

Controls:

  • Scroll to scroll.
  • Click on cards to play them.
  • E to end turn.
  • Escape to pause.
